subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: NORMAN, Okla., Sept. 8 (AP) — By the time Oklahoma quarterback Sam Bradford threw his fifth touchdown pass yesterday, tying a team record, the bad memories from past Miami games were long gone.
